forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...changing to snow late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. Morning high of 1C with temps falling to -5 to -3. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. Morning high of 37F with temps falling to near 25. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low near 20F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
